body:
If you want the patches soon, I can email them to you as an attachment.
I downloaded the patch file (rad3R4.tar.gz) from LBL on April 2002.
The file is only 72K.


Let me know if you're in a hurry for these.


Regards,
-Steve


Steven Baker                      
msbaker@cs.uoregon.edu
